quality_assessment: Subsection is essentially empty - only has heading with no content. Needs comprehensive troubleshooting documentation for automated documentation workflows including common issues, debugging techniques, and recovery strategies.

issues.description: No documentation for common issues when running documentation workflows
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section documenting common problems: feature analysis failures, drift detection errors, validation failures, book build errors, merge conflicts

issues.description: No guidance on how to debug documentation workflow failures
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining how to: check drift reports in .prodigy/book-analysis/, inspect validation results, review Claude logs, examine DLQ for failed chapters

issues.description: No documentation of where to find analysis artifacts and logs
No guidance on handling validation failures in map phase
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain how validation works, what the completeness score means, how to debug low scores, and how to manually fix documentation that fails validation

issues.description: No troubleshooting for mdbook build failures
issues.fix_suggestion: Document common mdbook errors: broken links, missing files, invalid markdown syntax, SUMMARY.md structure issues, and how to fix them

issues.description: No troubleshooting for feature analysis phase
issues.fix_suggestion: Document issues like: codebase analysis failures, missing source files, incorrect analysis_targets in book-config.json, feature extraction errors

issues.description: No guidance on debugging gap detection failures
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain how gap detection works, what to do when no gaps are found (might be configuration issue), how to validate gap detection results

issues.description: No documentation on resuming failed documentation workflows
issues.fix_suggestion: Explain how to resume interrupted documentation workflows, where checkpoints are stored, how to retry failed chapters from DLQ
Add tips for optimizing documentation workflows: adjusting max_parallel, processing subset of chapters, using filters to target specific documentation
Document common configuration errors: invalid JSON, missing required fields, incorrect paths, analysis_targets misconfiguration

improvement_suggestions: Add comprehensive troubleshooting content covering all phases of documentation workflow
Include practical examples of debugging commands and techniques
Provide cross-references to related subsections (workflow basics, checkpoint-and-resume)
Add FAQ section for quick reference
Include common error messages with explanations and fixes
Consider adding a troubleshooting decision tree or flowchart
Link to relevant Claude commands used in documentation workflow
